TopicTitle: When is the EVA bug getting a fix!?!

Articles.Content:
For months people have been reporting loosing control over Kerbals on EVA after transmitting science. This is a game breaker.

I know Squad is wholly aware of the bug, but after months, nothing has been done.

When are you going to fix this game breaking bug!?!
It's been fixed for the most part @Marcos9, they said so in the changelog, and I haven't encountered the glitch since then
Still encountering it after the patch.

On 5/31/2019 at 5:13 PM, Marcos9 said:

Still encountering it after the patch.

Okay, try sending a bug report

bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com

On 5/30/2019 at 5:07 AM, Marcos9 said:

For months people have been reporting loosing control over Kerbals on EVA after transmitting science. This is a game breaker.

I know Squad is wholly aware of the bug, but after months, nothing has been done.

When are you going to fix this game breaking bug!?!

Don't transmit science from Science Jr. 

I repeat: No transmitto dato de Science Jr.

Every report of the bug I found, and encountered myself, was encountered after any Science Jr had transmitted science, and would stay that way for the remainder of your current play (game reset fixes bug). 

As long as I've followed that rule, zero EVA problems. 

I bought this port before it was "Enhanced Edition" and I can tell you that this bug is not gamebreaking, just annoying (or challenging if your feeling gracious).
